resources.string: Likes pranking others and watering plants.
Likes reading books about planes and ships.
Loves music. Her room is full of various instruments, and she is proficient enough that she even taught a few classmates how to play.
Enjoys cooking. Souma is always driven to improve his cooking and never backs down from a challenge.
Loves painting. Before discovering the joy in painting, Yatora wandered aimlessly through life without rhyme or reason.
He enjoys doing karaoke, watching TV, and doing impressions.
See more or less information about a hero.
